item.title: Oilers will pick No. 1 overall again
item.description:
TORONTO (AP) - The Edmonton Oilers will pick first overall in the NHL draft for a second straight year.
The New Jersey Devils won the draft lottery Tuesday, but teams can't move up more than four spots, leaving Edmonton with the first overall pi...

item.title: Stars fire Crawford after missing playoffs again
item.description:
DALLAS (AP) - This season, Marc Crawford guided the Dallas Stars to the most points of any team in NHL history that didn't make the playoffs.
It wasn't enough to keep his job, either.
Crawford was fired Tuesday after just two seasons in charge....

item.description:

Win the Stanley Cup.

item.title: Islanders keep Capuano as coach, drop interim tag

item.title: Islanders keep Capuano as coach, drop interim tag
item.description:
